code:
def is_bleak_yaz(n):
    return -10 <= n <= 10 and ('0' not in str(n) or '1' not in str(n) or '2' not in str(n) or '5' not in str(n))

# Test cases
assert is_bleak_yaz(0) == True
assert is_bleak_yaz(1) == False
assert is_bleak_yaz(5) == False
assert is_bleak_yaz(10) == False
assert is_bleak_yaz(11) == False
assert is_bleak_yaz(-1) == True
assert is_bleak_yaz(-10) == True
assert is_bleak_yaz(-11) == False
prompt: Check if a number is bleak yaz.
